meanings.definition: A rough or unfinished drawing or painting.
meanings.sent1: She showed me her sketches of flowers.
meanings.sent2: The artist displayed her sketches at the gallery.
meanings.sent3: His sketches of animals always make me smile.
meanings.sent4: The sketches of the cityscape captured its essence.
meanings.sent5: The sketches of the mountains were breathtaking.

meanings.definition: A brief written or spoken account or description.
meanings.sent1: He wrote down his sketches of the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The journalist's sketches of the event were detailed.
meanings.sent3: Her sketches of the day's events were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The sketches of the story added depth to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The sketches of the recipe made it easy to follow.

meanings.definition: To make a rough drawing of something.
meanings.sent1: She sketches the landscape before painting.
meanings.sent2: He often sketches his ideas before finalizing them.
meanings.sent3: Sketches of his dream house filled the notebook.
meanings.sent4: She sketches a map to guide us through the forest.
meanings.sent5: The artist sketches the outline of the portrait first.

meanings.definition: To give a brief account or description of something.
meanings.sent1: He sketches the main points of the story.
meanings.sent2: She sketches the key features of the plan.
meanings.sent3: The comedian sketches a hilarious scene in his show.
meanings.sent4: The author sketches the character's background subtly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher sketches the lesson for better understanding.
